report.title: Results overview - ecological output
report.description: A report to display the ecological guild details on the Results Overview page.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and ttlav.deleted=false and ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#adult_attr_id#, #larval_attr_id#) join cache_termlists_terms tguild on tguild.id=ttlav.int_value #joins#

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join cache_samples_functional s on s.website_id=o.website_id and s.survey_id=o.survey_id and s.id=o.sample_id and s.id=#sample_id#
join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and sle.scratchpad_list_id=#sample_id#

param.name: adult_attr_id
param.description: Occurrance attribute that holds adult guild.

param.name: larval_attr_id
param.description: Occurrance attribute that holds larval guild.

param.name: stage
param.where: case ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id when #adult_attr_id# then 'adult' else 'larva' end = '#stage#'

column.name: stage
column.sql: case ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id when #adult_attr_id# then 'adult' else 'larva' end

column.name: ret
column.sql: count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) * 100 / ( select count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl #joins# )
